meroabout.title: About Top H Cleaning
meroabout.description: Top H Cleaning is a professional cleaning service provider specializing in residential and commercial cleaning.
meroabout.more: We combine years of experience with modern cleaning techniques to guarantee satisfaction and a healthier environment for our clients.
meroabout.professional_desc: Our trained cleaning specialists ensure every corner is spotless.
meroabout.safe_desc: We use eco-friendly products that are safe for families and pets.
meroabout.fast_desc: Our team completes tasks on time without compromising quality.
meroabout.eco_desc: We care for the environment with sustainable cleaning solutions.

skills.title: Core Expertise
skills.p1: Solid mastery of PHP and the Laravel framework for robust, scalable backend development.
skills.p2: Building dynamic, user-friendly interfaces with React.js and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
skills.p3: Expert in creating pixel-perfect, responsive designs using the utility-first framework Tailwind CSS.
skills.p4: Skilled in API development, database optimization (MySQL), and integrating third-party services.

objective.title: Why Hire Me? The Value I Bring.

about.objective_p1: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of hands-on experience building 10+ modern web applications using Laravel and React.js.
about.objective_p2: Skilled in API development, database optimization, and front-end performance improvements. Passionate about writing clean, scalable code and delivering user-centered solutions.

exp.subtitle: My Accomplishments and Key Impact: A showcase of my most significant development projects, highlighting my role and the technologies utilized to achieve their goals.
exp.title: Professional Experience
exp.hash_p1: Developed and deployed 3+ full-stack applications using Laravel, React.js, and Tailwind CSS.
exp.hash_p2: Implemented secure JWT authentication and integrated third-party APIs.
exp.hash_p3: Worked closely with UI/UX designers to deliver responsive, high-quality web experiences.
exp.aqar_p1: Improved backend performance by 30% through query optimization and caching.
exp.aqar_p2: Built and maintained RESTful APIs used by multiple frontend modules.
exp.aqar_p3: Collaborated with the frontend team to deliver a 20% faster user experience.

devdocs.title: DevDocs Language
devdocs.desc: A developer documentation hub that aggregates multiple languages and frameworks into one fast, searchable interface (React.js, Tailwind CSS).

ecommerce.title: E-commerce App (Laravel + React)
ecommerce.desc: Full-stack e-commerce platform with secure checkout, product management, and real-time order tracking using Laravel, React.js, and MySQL.

nidaa.title: Nidaa El-Samma
nidaa.desc: An Islamic web application with daily prayers, Quran listening, Tasbeeh, and prayer times with Adhan sound and Hijri date display.
